name: Asteroid Barrage (Espadrilero)
description:
Can you protect the Earth from a barrage of asteroids swiftly coming its way? See how long you can protect the planet and what score you will achieve.           

          This is a short space shooter game, slightly inspired by Space Invaders. Your objective is to protect the earth from a barrage of asteroids for as long as you can.  This game was originally intended for the Bean Jam #8 (https://itch.io/jam/bean-jam-8) , but I wasn't able to get a working prototype up in time, so I decided to polish it and upload it here.

          Controls: W,A,S,D - movement

                      SPACE - shoot

           I would love to hear your feedback about bugs or things that are lacking. Have fun!
